title: Clock app no longer plays songs from device
content:
I just updated to Android 11 yesterday and noticed when my alarm (using the native Clock app) went off this morning that it could no longer access the music file I previously had it pointing to, and when I tried to set it back up there is no longer an option to choose a file on the device to play; the only option currently available is selecting a file from google drive, youtube music, or spotify. Is this an oversight? Is there a workaround? I added the music file to my YouTube music library but there isn't actually an option to select a file from my library; I am currently only able to select from items listed in my "favorites" and then a bunch of recommended stuff. Is that an oversight? What's the point if I can't select music from my library?

Can we please just have the option to select local files back?
